DOC.detailed_description: 1 . Study Objective : To determine safety effectiveness ologen ( OculusGen ) Biodegradable Collagen Matrix Implant filtration surgery . The primary endpoint prove effectiveness via reduction IOP , secondary endpoint prove safety via incidence complication adverse event . 2 . Study Design : The study design open-label , randomize , parallel , comparative study . Patients meet inclusion/exclusion criterion sign inform consent include . After enrollment , patient randomize two group : trabeculectomy OculusGen implant trabeculectomy without antifibrotics . 3 . Follow-Up : There 7 post-operative follow-up visit within 6 month surgery : postoperative day 1 , 7 , 14 , 30 , 60 , 90 180 . A window ± 7 day allow 30 , 60 , 90 day visit ± 14 day 180 day visit . Further follow-up subject trial responsibility investigator .
